articles.description: Gmail, Outlook and users of other email services have been placed on red alert after the discovery of vicious new messaging scams.
articles.content: Anyone with an email account needs to remain cautious with security experts warning that cyber attacks are on the rise. The team at Avast say there has been a significant increase in online threats d… [+3151 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Fall detection on the Apple Watch refused to let a woman die - PhoneArena
articles.description: The fall detection feature on the Apple Watch saves a life by quickly calling for an ambulance allowing a woman with a ruptured aorta to get to the hospital in time.

articles.author: Robin Kearey
articles.title: Tiny 3D Printed Gaming PC Contains Real Retro Hardware - Hackaday
